AUTH_BIOMETRIC_NOT_ENROLLED: Biometric authentication is not set up on this device.
AUTH_BIOMETRIC_NOT_SUPPORTED: Biometric authentication is not supported on this device.
AUTH_PASSWORD_RULE: Password must be at least {{min}} characters and include uppercase, lowercase, and a number
AUTH_USE_BIOMETRIC: Use {{method}} to log in next time
SESSION_EXPIRED_MESSAGE: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
_ALERT_ABOVE_AVAILABLE: The amount exceed the available balance.
_ALERT_AGREE_TOS: You must agree to the Terms of Use.
_ALERT_CLAIM_SUCCESSFUL: You have successfully claimed the payment.
_ALERT_MIN_DURATION: Duration must be at least one day.
_ALERT_NO_INTERNET: No internet connection. Please try again when you're back online.
_ALERT_REQUEST_FAILED: Request failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
_ALERT_RECEIVED_TOPUP: You have received a top up.
_ALERT_SKIP_PASSPHRASE: You cannot skip passphrase at or above $10.00.
_CLAIMED: But payment has already been claimed.
_CONFIRM_CHANGE_PASSWORD: Are you sure you want to change your password? Your current password can not be re-used in the future.
_CONFIRM_PAYMENT: Are you sure you want to proceed with the payment?
_CONFIRM_REQUEST: Are you sure you want to send this request for payment?
_CONFIRM_WITHDRAW: Are you sure you want to withdraw?
_DEPOSIT_ADDRESS: Deposit your funds to this address
_DEPOSIT_WARNING: Funds must be sent to the exact address above. Sending to an incorrect address may result in a permanent loss of funds.
_ENTER_PASSPHRASE: Enter passphrase to claim the payment
_EXPIRED: But payment has expired and can no longer be claimed.
_INCORRECT_PASSPHRASE: Incorrect passphrase. Please verify it with the sender.
_NETWORK_WARNING: Only Send Supported Tokens listed above on Avalanche C-Chain
_NETWORK1: We're having an error while trying to connect with the network.
_NETWORK2: Please press the button below to reconnect.
_PAYMENT2: We're securely processing your payment right now. This usually takes a few seconds but may take longer if the network is busy.
_PAYMENT3: *This screen will automatically close once the payment is completed.
_PASSPHRASE_WARNING: Be sure to let recipient know what the exact passphrase is to avoid fund loss.
_PASSWORD_SECURITY: For your security, we don't store passwords and can't recover them. You can always update your password in account settings if needed.
_PASSWORD2: We're securely changing your password right now. This usually takes a few seconds but may take longer if the network is busy.
_PASSWORD3: *This screen will automatically close once the change is completed.
_PICKUP1: Recipient will be notified by email, and has
_PICKUP4: You must send the following link to your recipient, who has
_RECLAIM2: We're securely reclaiming your payment right now. This usually takes a few seconds but may take longer if the network is busy.
_RECLAIM3: *This screen will automatically close once the reclamation is completed.
_RECLAIMED: But payment has expired and since been reclaimed by the sender.
_SENT_REQUEST_TO2: A payment link has been sent to their email.
_RECOVERY_CODE_EXISTS: Your recovery code was already set up.
_RECOVERY_CODE_NOW: You do not yet have a recovery code. Would you like to create it now?
_RECOVERY_CODE_COMPLETED: Your new recovery code has been created. Please make sure you write it down now
_SIGNUP_ERROR: Sign up error: cannot sign up with your email and password
_SIGNUP2: We're securely creating your account right now. This usually takes a few seconds but may take longer if the network is busy.
_SIGNUP3: *This screen will automatically close once the creation is completed.
_TOS1: I confirm that I have read and agreed to the
_WITHDRAWAL2: We're securely processing your withdrawal right now. This usually takes a few seconds but may take longer if the network is busy.
_WITHDRAWAL3: *This screen will automatically close once the withdrawal is completed.
